name: Commonwealth ex rel. Belton, Appellant, v. Banmiller
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Belton v. Banmiller

judges: Before Jones, 0. J., Bell, Mtjsmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and McBride, JJ.
parties: Commonwealth ex rel. Belton, Appellant, v. Banmiller.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The order of the court below dismissing the petition for writ of habeas corpus is affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Richard Belton, appellant, in propria persona.
Juanita Kidd Stout, Assistant District Attorney, Paul M. Ghalfin, First Assistant District Attorney, and Victor II. Blanc, District Attorney, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth ex rel. Belton, Appellant, v. Banmiller.
Submitted October 9, 1959.
Before Jones, 0. J., Bell, Mtjsmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and McBride, JJ.
Richard Belton, appellant, in propria persona.
Juanita Kidd Stout, Assistant District Attorney, Paul M. Ghalfin, First Assistant District Attorney, and Victor II. Blanc, District Attorney, for appellee.
November 9, 1959:
